Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Duration|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Duration:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Duration#DurationFHIR R5 ComplexType `Duration` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Duration` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration`, but has no comparisons.
Duration.value (value):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Duration#Duration.valueElement `Duration.value` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration.value`, but has no comparisons.
Duration.comparator (comparator):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Duration#Duration.comparatorNote that the target element context `Duration.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `Duration.comparator` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration.comparator`, but has no comparisons.
Duration.unit (unit):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Duration#Duration.unitElement `Duration.unit` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration.unit`, but has no comparisons.
Duration.system (system):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Duration#Duration.systemElement `Duration.system` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration.system`, but has no comparisons.
Duration.code (code):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Duration#Duration.codeElement `Duration.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration.code`, but has no comparisons.

name: ConceptMapR5DurationElementsForR4Duration
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Duration` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions.
Element `Duration` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Duration.value` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration.value`, but has no comparisons.

Note that the target element context `Duration.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier.
Element `Duration.comparator` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration.comparator`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Duration.unit` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration.unit`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Duration.system` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration.system`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Duration.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Duration.code`, but has no comparisons.
